title: Extended Benefits and PayPass Contactless Payment Functionality for Hungary's Citi Life Credit Cardmembers
summary: Budapest, Hungary - The new Citi Life credit card program with extended benefits to resonate with the needs of today's customer provides a 3 percent return on food retail purchases, a 2 percent return on petrol spends and a 1 percent return on all other retail purchases across Hungary in addition to existing program benefits. The new Citi Life cards are designed to allow for a safe contactless payment at PayPass terminals for purchases up to HUF 5000 in support of a faster, easier and more convenient shopping experience with the new card.
tag-1: Extended Benefits and PayPass Contactless Payment Functionality for Hungary's Citi Life Credit Cardmembers
tag-2: Budapest, Hungary – The new Citi Life credit card program with extended benefits to resonate with the needs of today's customer provides a 3 percent return on food retail purchases, a 2 percent return on petrol spends and a 1 percent return on all other retail purchases across Hungary in addition to existing program benefits. The new Citi Life cards are designed to allow for a safe contactless payment at PayPass terminals for purchases up to HUF 5000 in support of a faster, easier and more convenient shopping experience with the new card.
tag-3: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said: "Through our innovative Citi Life multi-partner program launched this May, our customers were offered unique shopping benefits at more than 700 outlets of our 17 partners. We are pleased to have extended the benefits to daily food retail purchases and petrol shopping across Hungary in response to our customer needs."
tag-4: Jon Wiggins, Consumer Business Manager for Hungary, also remarked: "While we expanded our partners in this program to 20, we designed the new cards with one of today's most advanced payment features – PayPass – making shopping faster, easier and more convenient for our customers with their new Citi Life card."
tag-5: There are more than 100,000 PayPass terminals in 14 countries in EMEA, and around 2,000 in Hungary, including fast food chains, groceries, health and beauty shops, cafés, newsstands, cinemas and other specialty shops.
tag-6: More information on the enhanced Citi Life credit card program and the PayPass functionality are available at www.citilife.hu. Follow us on Citibank Hungary's Facebook site at www.facebook.com/CitibankMagyarorszag.
tag-7: Average percentage rate (APR) of Citi Life Credit Card is 29,9%, interest rate: 2,95%, if applied for Citi Life card in Citi Plus package or by online registration (except with application via card type change): 29.9%, interest rate: 2,04%. In each monthly settlement period for purchases made in resident retail groceries up to the maximum amount of HUF 100 000, for fuel purchases in Hungary up to HUF 50 000, 3% and 2% respectively shall be re credited, for purchases above these limits a Citi Forint recredit of 1 % is due. Recredit is due for each HUF 100 spent with Citi Life card. Citi Forints are credited within three business days of the booking day of Citi Life card purchases. The up-to-date list of Citi Life partners can be found at the website www.citilife.hu. The first PayPass purchase with Citi Life card should be with the usage of chip and PIN. Paying with Citi Life card contactless (with PayPass function) independently from the purchase amount the PIN code should be given based on security or other reasons.
